title: R. Nicholas Burns - Wikipedia
snippet: Robert Nicholas Burns (born January 28, 1956) is an American diplomat and international relations scholar. He served as the United States ambassador to China from 2022 to 2025. He is now Roy and Barbara Goodman Family Professor of the Practice of Diplomacy and International Relations at Harvard ...

title: Nicholas Burns | Harvard Kennedy School

title: Ambassador to the People’s Republic of China - U.S. Embassy & Consulates in China
snippet: Nicholas Burns was Ambassador of the United States of America to the People’s Republic of China (PRC). Nominated by President Biden, he was confirmed by the U.S. Senate in December 2021. He served from March 2022 until January 2025.

title: R. Nicholas Burns
snippet: R. Nicholas Burns (born January 28, 1956) is an American career diplomat who served as the United States Ambassador to the People's Republic of China from 2022 to 2025. Over a 27-year tenure in the U.S. Foreign Service spanning six presidents, ...

title: What US Ambassador to China Nick Burns Saw That Terrified Him — 3 Takeaways
